text: Olivier Dassault (1 June 1951 â€“ 7 March 2021) was a French politician and businessman. He was a member of the National Assembly from 1988 until 1997 and from 2002 until his death. Dassault was a member of the The Republicans. Dassault was born in Boulogne-Billancourt, France. Dassault was killed in a helicopter crash on 7 March 2021 near Touques, France at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Aviation deaths Category:French businesspeople Category:Politicians from Boulogne- Billancourt
title: Olivier Dassault
